plot outline: Armaan Pratap Singh, who returns from the USA, throws a major party at his house with nothing more than a bid to get back with his ex-girlfriend Shreya who he has'nt even written to or talked to in a long time. This movie is about four people/groups of people who attend, trying to attend or just happen to be there at the time namely Shreya and her friends, a Jat gym instructor, Karan a musician and a bunch of teenagers who just can't seem to locate the place and get into a lot of trouble with the locals.
title: Let's Enjoy
plot: Four different stories about different people trying to attend, already at or happening to encounter a major farmhouse party in suburban Delhi.

Armaan Pratap Singh, who returns from the USA, throws a major party at his house with nothing more than a bid to get back with his ex-girlfriend Shreya who he has'nt even written to or talked to in a long time. This movie is about four people/groups of people who attend, trying to attend or just happen to be there at the time namely Shreya and her friends, a Jat gym instructor, Karan a musician and a bunch of teenagers who just can't seem to locate the place and get into a lot of trouble with the locals.::NA
